name: Box TV
description:
please dont expect a good product, its not polished yet.

You sit alone in a room with nothing but a box tv. You will watch amazing videos/channels! This game is nothing but a fun time!

TAB - CHANGE CHANNELS

SPACE - POWER ON/OFF

MOST VIDEOS ARE NOT OWNED BY ME.

SEARCH "FULL STOP PUNCUATION" ON YOUTUBE TO FIND ORIGINAL VIDEOS.
